titles: VVine, beere, ale, and tobacco. Contending for superiority A dialogue.
author: Gallobelgicus.
publisher: By T[homas] C[otes] for Iohn Groue, and are to be sold at his shop at Furniuals Inne Gate in Holborne,
notes: A revision of "Wine, beere, and ale, together by the eares", which was attributed to Gallobelgicus.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Smoking --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
